name: ASW_KILL_WITHOUT_FRIENDLY_FIRE
description: Kill 25 drones without friendly fire. Four marines must be present in the mission.

name: ASW_NO_FRIENDLY_FIRE
description: Complete a mission with no friendly fire incidents. Four marines must be present in the mission.

name: ASW_SHIELDBUG
description: Deliver the finishing blow to a Swarm Shieldbug.

name: ASW_GRENADE_MULTI_KILL
description: Kill 6 Swarm with a single Grenade.

name: ASW_ACCURACY
description: Complete a mission with better than 90% accuracy.

name: ASW_NO_DAMAGE_TAKEN
description: Complete a mission on Normal difficulty or harder without receiving any damage.

name: ASW_EGGS_BEFORE_HATCH
description: Destroy all Swarm Eggs in a mission without allowing any to hatch.

name: ASW_GRUB_KILLS
description: Kill 100 Swarm Grubs.

name: ASW_MELEE_PARASITE
description: Kill a Swarm Parasite with a melee attack.

name: ASW_MELEE_KILLS
description: Kill 20 Swarm with melee attacks in a single mission.

name: ASW_BARREL_KILLS
description: Kill 5 Swarm with explosive barrels in a single mission.

name: ASW_INFESTATION_CURING
description: Cure an Infested marine.

name: ASW_FAST_WIRE_HACKS
description: Complete 10 wire hacks without access being logged.

name: ASW_FAST_COMPUTER_HACKS
description: Complete 10 computer hacks without access being logged.

name: ASW_GROUP_HEAL
description: Heal all 4 marines with a single Heal Beacon.

name: ASW_GROUP_DAMAGE_AMP
description: Kill 15 Swarm with all four marines under the effects of a Damage Amp in a single mission.

name: ASW_FAST_RELOADS_IN_A_ROW
description: Successfully perform 5 fast reloads in a row.

name: ASW_FAST_RELOAD
description: Successfully perform a fast reload.

name: ASW_ALL_HEALING
description: Heal 300 points of damage in a single mission without dealing any non-melee damage to the Swarm.

name: ASW_PROTECT_TECH
description: Guard the squad's tech so that he takes no damage during the hack.

name: ASW_TECH_SURVIVES
description: Finish a mission without the tech getting killed.

name: ASW_STUN_GRENADE
description: Stun 6 Swarm with a single Stun Grenade.

name: ASW_WELD_DOOR
description: Seal a door with the welder.

name: ASW_DODGE_RANGER_SHOT
description: Roll under a Swarm Ranger projectile.

name: ASW_BOOMER_KILL_EARLY
description: Kill a Swarm Boomer before it inflates.

name: ASW_FREEZE_GRENADE
description: Freeze 6 Swarm with a single Freeze Grenade.

name: ASW_AMMO_RESUPPLY
description: Deploy 10 ammo stashes that are used by other marines.
